page.title: 19Our school.
page.content: We have 6 classes in our school. There are a total of 158 children of which 75 are girls and 83 are boys. 82 children make up the 3 junior classes while the remaining form 3 infant classes. We have a headmaster, 6 class teachers and a teacher who comes four mornings to help the poor readers. Most children stay at school for dinner, only six go home. We have a nursery unit at our school. It was opened in June 1983. Twelve boys and eight girls attend the morning session from 9-00 to 11-30. 12 of these children live in Stanhope. Ten boys and eleven girls attend the afternoon session from 1-00 to 3-30. 13 of these children live in Stanhope. The nursery has a teacher and a nursery nurse.
